modName: Alternative Start - Codus a legionnarie - RP
summary: On the way back to Solitude Codus and his men come across a challenge most would run screaming from.  But no challenge is to great for the Imperial Legion!
descriptionHtml:
Growing up in Anvil during the great war has impressions on a persons life.  One of those impressions is a hate for the Aldmeri Dominion.  After taking Anvil they treated its residents like trash.  As soon as he was of age, Codus signed up in the Imperial Legion to teach those snobby elves a lesson.  Now Codus finds himself squashing a nord rebellion in Skyrim.  Legate Rikke has sent orders for him to report back to Solitude.  On the way there Codus and his men decided to stop by Whiterun for supplies.  As they neared Whiterun they came across a watchtower under attack.  Running to the city guards aid Codus and his men quickly realized that this will be no ordinary fight.   Too bad for this dragon that Codus has got his armor, sword, shield and legion training.  


This is an alternative start save.  His skills are:
All magic skills are at 0
Speech is at 20 for giving orders to his men
Light Armor is at 30 since every good legionnaire should be proficient in all types of armors
All other sneak skills are at 0 because the legions exist to protect the people not steal from them
One handed, block and heavy armor are at 40 since these are Codus\'s preferences
Two handed is at 20 from basic legion training
Archery is at 30 because of the intense archery training legionnaires go through
Smithing is at 20 since legionnaires have to sharpen their own swords every once and a while

Credits:
